summary: The Organic Science and Research Investment Act of 2025 aims to expand organic agricultural research. It establishes an initiative within the Agricultural Research Service to coordinate and expand resources for organic research, including surveys and strategic plans. The bill amends existing acts to increase funding for organic research, support transitioning to organic farming, and conduct economic impact analyses of organic agriculture. It focuses on facilitating research, identifying best practices, and improving agricultural methods to adapt and mitigate climate change within the organic farming sector.
